product_name: Feedback Sports Alpine Digital Bicycle Scale
long_description: The Alpine Digital bike scale is specifically designed to weigh bicycles, wheels, backpacks and other outdoor equipment. Precise scale measures any gear up to 55 lbs; pounds / ounce / kilogram selections available. Patented design enables scale to be clamped onto bicycle repair stand or hung from a ceiling hook. Rubber-coated hook protects your frames finish and prevents the bike from sliding. For small parts, hang a bucket or bag on the hook and re-zero the scale to tare the weight. Rugged, shock-resistant rubber housing endures the abuses of the typical bike workshop, garage or toolbox. Auto shut-off saves power. Four AAA batteries included. 0.02 pound (10g) display resolution; +/- 10g accuracy.
short_description: The Alpine Digital bike scale is specifically designed to weigh bicycles, wheels, backpacks and other outdoor equipment.
